## Overview

Select a passage, read the Vulgate text of passage along with zoomable/pannable image of the page where that passage occurs.

## Notebook

:::{.callout-warning title="Uses local resources"}
This notebook uses data in local files, and expects to be run files from a copy of [this github repository](https://github.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts).
:::

- [HTML version]() (readable in a web browser)
- [Pluto notebook](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts/refs/heads/main/pluto/physical-artifact/passage-plus-images.jl) (download and run in Pluto)
